metadata.prompt: An energetic title card that says "THE RITUAL" with two icons below it: a scrub brush and a bubbling jar. An arrow points from the brush to the jar, emphasizing the order.
A close-up shot of gloved hands using a small, stiff brush to scrub the teeth of a comb under running water. The focus is on the cleaning action.
A close-up studio shot of a styling comb on a white surface. The comb has some visible hair strands caught in the teeth, indicating it needs cleaning. High definition, professional lighting.
A shot of a dirty comb being dropped into a disinfectant jar, with a huge, red, animated 'X' stamping on the screen. The water turns cloudy and gross.
A satisfying shot of a perfectly clean comb being gently lowered into a crystal-clear jar of blue disinfectant. Bubbles rise, and the shot is clean and professional.
A final split screen. On the left, a "Scrub" icon with a checkmark. On the right, a "Soak" icon with a checkmark. The title above reads: "Scrub THEN Soak. Always."
